title: 08/30/21 DPS Hour 2 David Carr
itunes:title: 08/30/21 DPS Hour 2 David Carr
description:
David Carr talks to Dan about life as a new QB behind these offensive lines. David said he would like to see these young QBs play the position of QB instead of having to run for their lives due to bad offensive lines.
